# FII-WADE Development Guidelines

Auto-generated from all feature plans. Last updated: 2025-11-12

## Active Technologies
- PostgreSQL (persistent metadata/subscriptions), pyoxigraph/oxigraph (RDF triple store for SPARQL), Redis (HTTP proxy cache) (001-vuln-dds-sparql)

- Python 3.11+ + FastAPI (API/proxy server), pyoxigraph (SPARQL/RDF storage), aiohttp (async HTTP client), redis-py (caching), pydantic (data validation) (001-vuln-dds-sparql)
